# dct-list

## Properties

| Property               | Attribute  | Description                 | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------------- | ---------- | --------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`             | `disabled` | List is in a disabled state | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `heading` _(required)_ | `heading`  | Optional list heading       | `string`  | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description            |
| ------------------------------ | ---------------------- |
| `--dct-accordion-background`   | accordion background   |
| `--dct-accordion-border-color` | accordion border color |
